name: Playland-Not-At-The-Beach
description: Nonprofit museum celebrating bygone amusements, featuring artifacts from San Francisco's historic Playland at the Beach and Sutro Baths.
fullDescription: Nonprofit museum celebrating bygone amusements, featuring artifacts from San Francisco's historic Playland at the Beach and Sutro Baths.
address: 10979 San Pablo Ave, El Cerrito, CA 94530
keywords: Playland-Not-At-The-Beach, El Cerrito, vintage amusements, Sutro Baths, pinball, arcade, San Francisco nostalgia
